Translations.Text: Ya eyyuhellezine amenu hel edullukum ala ticaretin tuncikum min azabin elim(elimin)
Tu´minune billahi ve resulihi ve tucahidune fi sebilillahi bi emvalikum ve enfusikum, zalikum hayrun lekum in kuntum ta´lemun(ta´lemune)
Yagfir lekum zunubekum ve yudhılkum cennatin tecri min tahtihel enharu ve mesakine tayyibeten fi cennati adn(adnin), zalikel fevzul azim(azimu)
Ve uhra tuhıbbuneha, nasrun minallahi ve fethun karib(karibun), ve bessiril mu’minin(mu’minine)

Ya eyyuhellezine amenu kunu ensarallahi kema kale isebnu meryeme lil havariyyine men ensari ilallah(ilallahi), kalel havariyune nahnu ensarullah(ensarullahi), fe amenet taifetun min beni israile ve keferet taifeh(taifetun), fe eyyednellezine amenu ala aduvvihim fe asbehu zahirin(zahirine)
